fr_FR.description: À l'origine, DrAzTiK avait développé un petit mod rendant le combat plus dynamique et plus relevé contre Tazok et Dig-Dag dans le repaire de Firkraag. Depuis, il s'est considérablement étoffé, s'est enrichi de nombreux composants et a désormais pour ambition de permettre aux joueurs de conduire des combats « épiques » dans de larges espaces et de rapprocher BG2 d'un Dungeon crawler. Consultez le readme pour bien comprendre ce qu'apporte chacun de ses composants.

components.10: Combat contre Tazok et DigDag revise par DrAzTiK [a installer avant Stratagems]
components.11: Reequilibrage de certaines creatures generiques [a installer avant Stratagems]
components.12: Reequilibrage de Tazok et de DigDag [a installer avant Stratagems]
components.20: Rencontre avec Groumf et Bourrinos devant le donjon de Firkraag [a installer avant Stratagems]
components.21: Rencontre avec Groumf et Bourrinos a Brynnlaw [a installer avant Stratagems]
components.22: Rencontre avec Groumf et Bourrinos dans les Trefonds Obscurs [a installer avant Stratagems]
components.30: Combat revisite de Sarevok necrophage dans les Abysses [a installer avant Stratagems]
components.32: Musiques de combat dans les zones sans musique [a installer avant ou apres Stratagems]
components.40: Creatures de DrAzTiK [a installer avant Stratagems, composant indispensable pour les suivants !]
components.41: Boucherie de nains dans le donjon d'Irenicus [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.43: Boucherie d'animaux/druides dans la foret de Tethyr [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.44: Boucherie de demons dans la Sphere planaire [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.45: 3 boucheries dans Spellhold (golems, vampires et trolls) [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.46: Boucherie de trolls a l'exterieur du Chateau de'Arnise [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.47: Boucherie d'orques dans les Collines de Lancevent [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.48: Boucherie de loups dans les Collines d'Umar [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.49: 2 boucheries d'animaux sauvages : Franc-Marche et Tour de Garde [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.50: 2 boucheries de golems a Suldanessellar et dans la Tour de Garde (Machine de Lum le Fou) [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.51: Boucherie de Yaga Shura amelioree [a installer apres Ascension et Stratagems]
components.52: Boucherie d'animaux/druides dans le Bosquet aux druides [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.53: Boucherie de fanatiques dans l'antre de l'Oeil aveugle [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.54: Boucherie de vampires dans l'antre de Bodhi au chapitre 2, avant l'Ombreterre [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.55: Boucherie de vampires dans l'antre de Bodhi au chapitre 6, apres l'Ombreterre [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.56: 2 boucheries de sahuagins (Cite sous-marine et campement githyanki dans la Tour de Garde) [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.57: 4 boucheries d'araignees : entree de l'antre de Pai'Na, Temple d'Amaunator (Oeil aveugle), 1er etage de la Tour de Garde et devant l'Enclave de Sendai [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.58: 6 boucheries de squelettes (catacombes d'Atkthtla, Ruine du Temple, Spellhold, Tour de Garde et 2 dans le temple de Nyalee) [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.80: Transformer BG2 en Dungeon crawler [a installer apres Stratagems]
components.90: Composant cosmetique [a installer avant ou apres Stratagems]

en_US.description: Originally, DrAzTiK developed a small mod to make the fight against Tazok and Dig-Dag in Firkraag's lair more dynamic and challenging. Since then, it has grown considerably, adding numerous components and now aims to enable players to conduct "epic" battles in large spaces, bringing BG2 closer to a Dungeon crawler. Take a look at the readme to understand what each component brings.

components.10: DrAzTiK's revisited fight against Tazok and DigDag [install before Stratagems]
components.11: Rebalancing some generic creatures [install before Stratagems]
components.12: Rebalancing Tazok and DigDag [install before Stratagems]
components.20: Groumf and Bourrinos Encounter at Firkraag's Hideout entrance [install before Stratagems]
components.21: Groumf and Bourrinos Encounter at Brynnlaw [install before Stratagems]
components.22: Groumf and Bourrinos Encounter in the Underdark [install before Stratagems]
components.30: Revisited fight against Wraith Sarevok in the Abyss [install before Stratagems]
components.32: Add battle songs in some areas that do not have any [install before or after Stratagems]
components.40: DrAzTiK's Creatures [install before Stratagems, some following components need it]
components.41: Butchery in Irenicus Dungeon (Dwarves) [install after Stratagems]
components.43: Butchery in the Forest of Tethyr (Animals and Druids) [install after Stratagems]
components.44: Butchery in the planar sphere (Demonic creatures) [install after Stratagems]
components.45: 3 butcheries in Spellhold (Golems, Vampires and Trolls) [install after Stratagems]
components.46: Butchery outside de'Arnise Keep (Trolls) [install after Stratagems]
components.47: Butchery in Windspear Hills (Orcs) [install after Stratagems]
components.48: Butchery in Umar Hills (Wolves) [install after Stratagems]
components.49: 2 butcheries in Trademeet and outside Watcher's Keep (Animals) [install) after Stratagems]
components.50: 2 butcheries of Golems in Suldanessellar and Watcher's Keep (Machine of Lum the Mad floor) [install after Stratagems]
components.51: Butchery of Yaga-Shura revisited [install after Ascension and Stratagems]
components.52: Butchery in the Druid Grove area (Animals and Druids) [install after Stratagems]
components.53: Butchery in the Beholder Hideout (Fanatics) [install after Stratagems]
components.54: Butchery in Bodhi's Hideout (chapter 2, before Underdark) - Vampires [install after Stratagems]
components.55: Butchery in Bodhi's Hideout (chapter 6, after Underdark) - Vampires [install after Stratagems]
components.56: 2 butcheries of Sahuagins in Sahuagin City and Watcher's Keep (Githyanki Encampment) [install after Stratagems]
components.57: 4 butcheries of spiders in Pai'Na's Hideout entrance, Temple City (Unseeing Eye Plot), Watcher's Keep first floor (Altar level) and in the area outside Sendai's Hideout [install after Stratagems]
components.58: 6 butcheries of skeletons in the lower tombs of Athkatla, Shadow Temple Land, Spellhold, Watcher's Keep (Last Seals), and 2 in Nyalee's Hideout [install after Stratagems]
components.80: More enemies scattered throughout the game [install after Stratagems]
components.90: Cosmetic component [install before or after Stratagems]

zh_CN.description: 最初，DrAzTiK开发了一个小型模组，用于让在费尔克拉ag巢穴中与Tazok和Dig-Dag的战斗更具动态性和挑战性。此后，它得到了极大的扩展，增加了许多组件，其目标现在是让玩家能够在广阔的空间中指挥“史诗级”战斗，并让博德之门2更接近地城爬行游戏。请阅读readme文件以充分了解每个组件带来的功能。

components.10: 重新制作的DrAzTiK对抗塔佐克和迪格达格酋长的战斗[在Stratagems前安装]
components.11: 重新平衡一些通用生物[在Stratagems前安装]
components.12: 重新平衡塔佐克和迪格达格酋长[在Stratagems前安装]
components.20: 格罗姆夫和布尔里诺斯在费尔克拉格藏身处入口的遭遇[在Stratagems前安装]
components.21: 格罗姆夫和布尔里诺斯在布林罗的遭遇[在Stratagems前安装]
components.22: 格罗姆夫和布尔里诺斯在地下黑暗的遭遇[在Stratagems前安装]
components.30: 在深渊中重新制作的对抗幽灵沙洛佛克的战斗[在Stratagems前安装]
components.32: 在一些没有战斗歌曲的区域添加战斗歌曲[安装前或安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.40: DrAzTiK的生物[在Stratagems前安装，一些后续组件需要它]
components.41: 在艾瑞尼卡斯地牢中的屠杀（矮人）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.43: 在泰斯尔森林中的屠杀（动物和德鲁伊）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.44: 在位面领域的屠杀（恶魔生物）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.45: 在禁魔监狱的3场屠杀（魔像、吸血鬼和食人魔）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.46: 在德阿尼斯要塞外的屠杀（食人魔）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.47: 在风矛之丘的屠杀（兽人）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.48: 在乌玛丘陵的屠杀（狼）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.49: 在崔米镇和观察者堡垒外的2场屠杀（动物）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.50: 在索丹尼斯拉和观察者堡垒的2场魔像屠杀（疯狂卢姆的机器楼层）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.51: 重新制作的雅加苏拉屠杀[安装后请安装Ascension和Stratagems]
components.52: 在德鲁伊林地区域的屠杀（动物和德鲁伊）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.53: 在眼魔藏身处的屠杀（狂热者）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.54: 在芭狄藏身处的屠杀（第2章，在地下黑暗之前）- 吸血鬼[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.55: 在芭狄藏身处的屠杀（第6章，在地下黑暗之后）- 吸血鬼[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.56: 在鲨化鱼人城和观察者堡垒的2场鲨化鱼人屠杀（吉斯洋基人营地）[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.57: 在派娜藏身处入口、神庙城（不可见之眼情节）、观察者堡垒一楼（祭坛层）和仙黛藏身处外区域的4场蜘蛛屠杀[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.58: 在阿斯卡特拉下层墓穴、阴影神殿、禁魔监狱、观察者堡垒（最后封印）、以及妮阿莉藏身处的2场骷髅屠杀[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.80: 游戏中分布的更多敌人[安装后请安装Stratagems]
components.90: 外观组件[安装前或安装后请安装Stratagems]
